resources.string: Fight climate change while supporting sustainable shopping.
Have peace of mind and instantly resolve unexpected issues hassle-free.
Protect your order with premium package assurance and carbon neutral shipment.
Instant premium package assurance for damage, loss, or theft.
Save time and headache reporting unexpected shipment issues.
Easily resolve issues and get a replacement or refund, hassle-free.
Neutralize the carbon emissions from delivering this order.
Get certified carbon credits recorded at the project carbon registry.
Track your certificates and see your personal climate impact.

Shipped offers carbon offsets, shipment protection with tracking services and hassle-free solutions for resolving shipment issues for online purchases that are damaged in transit, lost by the carrier, or stolen immediately after the carrier’s proof of delivery where Shipped monitors the shipment. Invisible Commerce Limited, or it’s licensed producer entity Shipped Insurance Services LLC, may receive compensation for its services and for your usage of Shipped Shield.
